# Agent System Documentation

This directory contains guides and references for the agent intelligence system.

## Files

### Core Architecture
- **`agent-philosophy.md`** - Core principles: Living Genome, Ouroboros, dogfooding
- **`agent-system-overview.md`** - Agent catalog, directory structure, workflows

### Agent Development
- **`agent-onboarding.md`** - Structured learning path and training scenarios
- **`agent-quick-reference.md`** - Quick reference for common tasks
- **`agent-workflows.md`** - Workflow procedures with practical examples
- **`decision-matrices.md`** - Quick decision trees for agent scenarios

### Collaboration & Quality
- **`agent-communication.md`** - Inter-agent protocols
- **`agent-metrics.md`** - Quality tracking and KPIs
- **`ontological-proposition-guide.md`** - PR workflow for ontological evolution
- **`dogfooding-guide.md`** - Self-improvement workflows

### Infrastructure
- **`conventional-tools.md`** - npm scripts, linters, validators, testing tools
- **`path-specific-instructions.md`** - How glob pattern instruction loading works
- **`TEMPLATE-EXTRACTION-GUIDE.md`** - Adapting this system to new repositories
- **`future-roadmap.md`** - Potential enhancements

## Quick Start Paths

| Goal | Start Here | Then | Reference |
|------|-----------|------|-----------|
| **New to system** | `agent-philosophy.md` | `agent-onboarding.md` | `decision-matrices.md` |
| **Contributing to ontology** | `ontological-proposition-guide.md` | `agent-workflows.md` | `decision-matrices.md` |
| **Improving agents** | `agent-metrics.md` | `dogfooding-guide.md` | `future-roadmap.md` |
| **New repository setup** | `TEMPLATE-EXTRACTION-GUIDE.md` | `agent-system-overview.md` | `conventional-tools.md` |

## Related Directories

→ **Specifications**: `.github/specs/`  
→ **Instructions**: `.github/instructions/`  
→ **Agents/Prompts/Skills**: `.github/agents/`, `.github/prompts/`, `.github/skills/`
